overview: April has secretly fantasized about making her close friend Sara cum, and when Sara's man leaves her for another woman April finally has the opportunity to seduce her vulnerable friend. • Karlie Montana and Staci Carr are on a hike to find a secluded spot for some yoga. • A dreary rainy day can't get Casana Lei and Olivia Wilder down as long as they have each other. • Sara Luvv sits on the bed dressed in a sheer camisole as she awaits her lover Megan Salinas.
title: A Sweet Taste
